EQUIPMENT_SIDEARM Sidearm $1$2$4 EQUIPMENT_SIDEARM_LORE Are they too close for your fancy railgun?\nGrab a knife and stab, stab, stabity-stab!
EQUIPMENT_SMARTGUN_AIMING_UNIT Smartgun Aiming Unit $1$2$4 EQUIPMENT_SMARTGUN_AIMING_UNIT_LORE When locked on target, it's any gunner's best friend, but for the love of God, do not touch the automatic aim option unless you want to play Solitare tonight.
EQUIPMENT_MEDAL_OF_HONOR Medal of Honor $1$2$4 EQUIPMENT_MEDAL_OF_HONOR_LORE In the Solar system, a Medal of Honor meant an A-class citizenship. In the Siren system, there is no material value behind it, only the respect gained through the blood and pain of the battlefield.
EQUIPMENT_TARGETING_SYSTEM Targeting System EQUIPMENT_TARGETING_SYSTEM_DESCRIPTION No distance penalties for ranged attacks. EQUIPMENT_TARGETING_SYSTEM_LORE The phrase high-tech is overused. To be truthful, this is late 23rd-century, moderate-level tech. Like 50 years old, third-world, Cold-war stock inherited by a local insurgency level of tech. But still, brutally effective.
EQUIPMENT_RAZOR_BEAM Razor Beam EQUIPMENT_RAZOR_BEAM_DESCRIPTION EQUIPMENT_RAZOR_BEAM_DESCRIPTION EQUIPMENT_RAZOR_BEAM_LORE While a ton of tech is banned in the Solar system, the Siren system is a frontier without speeding tickets, where blowing six-inch holes through gentlemen clad in military-grade armor is considered fair game.
EQUIPMENT_PANZER_BITING_PLASMA Panzer-biting Plasma EQUIPMENT_PANZER_BITING_PLASMA_DESCRIPTION Energy weapons melt armored enemies.(Bonus for Soldier, Beholder,The Bright One, The Blazing One, Zieregal and High Zieregal.) EQUIPMENT_PANZER_BITING_PLASMA_LORE Understanding the crystal-based technology of the Primals is beyond even the most skillful Tumori shaman. Most consider it straight-up magic. But tell me, when has a lack of knowledge ever prevented using an unknown phenomenon as a weapon?
EQUIPMENT_SUBDERMAL_ARMOR Subdermal Armor EQUIPMENT_SUBDERMAL_ARMOR_DESCRIPTION Second skin for your units (assuming they have one in the first place) EQUIPMENT_SUBDERMAL_ARMOR_LORE Tumori biomancy at its finest form. A small stratum of cells impregnated the membrane with zirconium dioxide. Undisguisable by the immune system or even repair nanobots.
EQUIPMENT_SMART_BALLISTIC_PLATING Smart ballistic plating EQUIPMENT_SMART_BALLISTIC_PLATING_DESCRIPTION Description for testing purposes EQUIPMENT_SMART_BALLISTIC_PLATING_LORE If it was really smart, it would help you finish college and prevent you from enlisting. That would be a really good way to protect you from bullets. But, here we are. Now give me fifty rookie!
EQUIPMENT_BURN_PUNCHER Burn Puncher EQUIPMENT_BURN_PUNCHER_DESCRIPTION Description for testing purposes EQUIPMENT_BURN_PUNCHER_LORE When they run out of ideas, they always glue together something that fires a flame or an electric charge and call it an upgrade. This time the coin showed the "flame side".
EQUIPMENT_CEREMONIAL_FLAG Ceremonial flag EQUIPMENT_CEREMONIAL_FLAG_DESCRIPTION Increases morale EQUIPMENT_CEREMONIAL_FLAG_LORE Trampled on, torn off, thrown down, spat on, weather-stained. Beaten countless times. But there is always someone who raises it again. It is just a piece of mycelial fabric, but simultaneously it's so much more.
EQUIPMENT_CROSS_OF_VALOR Cross of Valor EQUIPMENT_CROSS_OF_VALOR_DESCRIPTION Increases morale EQUIPMENT_CROSS_OF_VALOR_LORE Some say the divine will of the Goddes strengthens the bearer and their army. Others claim that hope and bravery are artificial and something is meddling with your brainwaves. All that's known is that there is no way to measure its influence, but there is certainly some.
EQUIPMENT_BESIEGER_TOOLS Besieger tools EQUIPMENT_BESIEGER_TOOLS_DESCRIPTION Increases damage dealt to structures EQUIPMENT_BESIEGER_TOOLS_LORE Towering walls, strong gates, and enemy cowards shooting you from loopholes instead of facing you mano a mano. All in all, a siege batlle is anything but fun. However, with a proper ram, you can skip the annoying part and get to hammer distance in no time.
